overview: Film originally shot between 1990 and 94 in Super 8, and which has been restored in 2022 for its premiere at the B-series Festival, B-Retina.  A man runs desperately through a forest. He runs away from something or someone, but falls off a cliff before we know what or who is after him. Two years later, several seemingly unrelated events set in motion a gear where death, legends and madness have their own names.
title: Terra d'Ombres
